item.title: Spring Budget 2024: Winners and Losers
item.dc:creator: Rachael Khan
item.description: At 12.30pm today, Chancellor of the Exchequer Jeremy Hunt announced the UK Spring Budget, as well as the economic and fiscal forecast by the Office of Budget Responsibility. These legislative announcements are game-changers for Britain’s economy, and Huntâ€™s announcements included a number of sweeping changes that could potentially affect the personal finances of everyone living […]
